directions: Mix first 4 ingredients in large bowl. Let stand 5 minutes to soften oats. Whisk orange juice and honey in medium bowl. Stir in grated apples and almonds, then 3 cups chopped fruit. Stir fruit mixture into oat mixture. DO AHEAD: Can be made 8 hours ahead. Cover; chill. Spoon into bowls.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups grated peeled red-skinned apples (about 2 medium)
3 cups chopped fresh fruit (such as apples, pears, and peeled oranges)
title: Fruit and Oat Muesli
